name: Alolan Muk
author: Hitoshi Ariga
flavor_text: While it’s unexpectedly quiet and friendly, if it’s not fed any trash for a while, it will smash its Trainer’s furnishings and eat up the fragments.

abilities.name: Power of Alchemy
abilities.effect: Each Basic Pokémon in play, in each player’s hand, and in each player’s discard pile has no Abilities.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
